name: Word Hunt (Alipheese, osgux)
description:
Welcome to the Word Hunt fair!

Bubbles with words in English, Spanish and Japanese (romaji), will move in and out of the screen. Your objective is to explode as many bubbles as you can, and make sure when they fall they do so in their correspondent language bucket. 

Shooting randomly may seem an attractive option, but beware as if words of a language enter into the wrong bucket, points will be taken off your score. 

Enjoy and learn!
